:::Wheeljack:::

Wheeljack: That's right. But-
::He turns to Vamprah::
Wheeljack: You must be careful not to sweep them TOO much off their feet. We 
once had an operative there who fell in love, and whether it was real or not, 
she took awhile coming back, and died shortly after in a battle here at base. 
 Whatever the case, we don't want to lose you.

--part1_119.4070205.28c1c320_boundary
